textAfterTable: Building Features & Amenities Elevator Attended Lobby Concierge Fitness Center Indoor Pool Residents Lounge Childrens Playroom WiFi Access On-site Garage Billiards WiFi Access Tenant Lounge with Fireplace Clubhouse/Clubroom Bicycle Storage Landscaped Roof Deck Terrace Courtyard/Plaza Landscaped Grounds Units: 650 High-rise (26+ Floors) Built 2003 Rental Property Pet policy: Pets OK , Dogs under 50 lbs and up to two cats Owner:: With its grand tower soaring 51-stories and adjoined sister tower rising 26-stories, 2 Gold is the centerpiece of Manhattan's fastest growing residential area, located in the heart of the new Downtown. The high-rise buildings add a unique feel to the area with their cutting-edge architecture, modern amenities and historical charm. Choose from studio, one, two, and three bedroom layouts equipped with oversized thermopane picture windows, hardwood flooring, and premium stainless steel appliances. Some even feature high ceilings and private terraces or balconies. Life at 2 Gold Street is the epitome of luxury and comfort. Take a swim in the heated, glass enclosed lap pool, go for a jog in the fitness center, lounge on the roof deck with a real grass lawn, or retreat to the rooftop solarium featuring a gas fireplace, wet bar, and catering kitchen.
